channel.title: I need a new TV
channel.description: I've been searching around now for awhile, and now my old TV is beginning to die. So I figured, why not ask the wonderful people of BM Forums what recommendations they have. I'm not too picky on what kinda TV I need, but I have found I don't much like plasma screen TV's. Also, something above 32 inches would be nice. My price range is semi-flexible, but I'd like to avoid spending over 300 bucks if possible. Any recommendations are welcome, thanks.

item.title: I need a new TV
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Haven’t looked into buying a TV for a while, but from what I remember Vizio TVs are usually good quality while still being inexpensive.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a new TV
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
Maxey:

What kind of main use are you going to give it? If you’re going to play games on it, I recommend you use this site to get a TV with little lag in order to enjoy it better.

Mm yeah, I’m probably gonna use it mainly for gaming. Thanks for the site, I’ll look through it and see what I can find xD

And an OLED would be nice, but I don’t have that kinda money :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: I need a new TV
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
LED backlit tv’s almost never break

OLED tv’s never break
